Their meteoric New York City rise...is a better example of the American dream than most fiction.   Xian Famous Foods made a mark on the citys culinary world with its hand-pulled noodles and spicy Chinese fare. Think biang-biang noodles pulled to order, dumplings doused in our signature dipping sauce, and a refreshing, vinegar-y liang pi for hot summer days or any day.
